resources.string: muZak can automatically download artist information from Last.fm. Would you like to enable this feature?\n\n(This can be changed later in Settings.)
What would you like to shuffle?
Your changes have not been saved! Would you like to save them now?
Search for new artists in the media store
Refresh the cover art for all albums; will also remove artists that have no albums
Automatically hide overlays after 5 seconds when playing

muZak is a music player app for Android, developed by Lenworth Rose. Copyright 2015 Lenworth Rose

Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License. You may obtain a copy of the License at

http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License.

muZak uses DragSortListView to support playlist editing. The DragSortListView library was created by Carl Bauer, and it is used under Apache License Version 2.0. You can find more information about DragSortListView - including the license text - at its github repository: https://github.com/bauerca/drag-sort-listview

muZak uses StickyGridHeaders on the search results page. The StickyGridHeaders library was created by Tonic Artos, and it is used under Apache License Version 2.0. You can find more information about DragSortListView - including the license text - at its github repository: https://github.com/TonicArtos/StickyGridHeaders

muZak uses Glide to load images. The Glide library was created by Sam Judd, and it is used under Apache License Version 2.0. You can find more information about Glide - including the license text - at its repository: https://github.com/bumptech/glide

muZak uses TouchImageView to provide scroll and zoom functionality in the Image Viewer. TouchImageView was created by Mike Ortiz, with contributions by Patrick Lackemacher, Babay88, @ipsilondev, hank-cp, and singpolyma. You can find more information about TouchImageView - including the license text and source code - at its repository: https://github.com/MikeOrtiz/TouchImageView

muZak uses PagerSlidingTabStrip to provide tabs on the Playing Now and Theater Remote pages. PagerSlidingTabStrip was created by Andreas Stuetz. You can find more information about PagerSlidingTabStrip - including the license text and source code - at its repository: https://github.com/astuetz/PagerSlidingTabStrip
The source for muZak can be found here: https://github.com/lenworthrose/music-app
